T02D3780:221b-1: n'a ga ba lim bi bhi: bod skad du /
T02D3780:221b-2: klu gtor gyi cho ga / rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3780:221b-3: rang nyid lha yi nga rgyal gyis //
T02D3780:221b-4: byams dang snying rje byang chub sems //
T02D3780:221b-5: yang dang yang du bsgoms byas la //
T02D3780:221b-6: mdun du pam las padma ni ;
T02D3780:221b-7: / kha dog dmar po 'dab brgyad steng //
T02D3780:221b-8: phu: brgyad las ni klu brgyad bskyed //
T02D3780:221b-9: de nas snying ga'i 'od zer dang //
T02D3780:221b-10: aom phe phu zhes pas klu chen brgyad //
T02D3780:221b-11: 'khor dang bcas pa bkug la bstim //
T02D3780:221b-12: dkar gsum mngar gsum bdud rtsir bcas //
T02D3780:221b-13: dam tshig ye shes klu rnams mchod //
T02D3780:221b-14: de nas gtor ma byin brlabs te //
T02D3780:221b-15: snod ni hi las rin po che //
T02D3780:221b-16: shin tu mdzes shing blta na sdug / yangs la rgya ni che bar bsam //
T02D3780:221b-17: rin chen snod mchog de nang du //
T02D3780:221b-18: dkar gsum mngar gsum bdud rtsir bcas //
T02D3780:221b-19: snod ni shin tu gang bar bsam //
T02D3780:221b-20: de yi steng du yi ge gsum ;
T02D3780:221b-21: / kha dog dri dang ro sbyangs nas //
T02D3780:221b-22: bdud rtsi'i ro mchog brgya dang ldan //
T02D3780:221b-23: g-yas pa mchog sbyin phyag rgya la //
T02D3780:221b-24: ha ho hri pam dag las ni //
T02D3780:221b-25: dpag bsam shing ni bsam byas la //
T02D3780:221b-26: lo ma yal ga thams cad la //
T02D3780:221b-27: rin chen bum pa bdud rtsis bkang //
T02D3780:221b-28: dpag tu med pa bsams nas ni //
T02D3780:221b-29: bhr'um las bdud rtsi'i char bab pas //
T02D3780:221b-30: gtor mas yongs su gang bar bsam //
T02D3780:221b-32: mgron rnams thams cad lce las ni //
T02D3780:221b-33: h'um las rdo rje'i sbu gus rngub //
T02D3780:221b-34: aom aa nanta ba lim ai ngam kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02D3780:222a-2: aom ku li ka / aom p'a su ki / aom sham kha p'a la /
T02D3780:222a-5: aom nanda n'a gar'a dz'a ya /
T02D3780:222a-6: aom phem klu'i rgyal po sogs ma med //
T02D3780:222a-7: ba lim ai dam kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02D3780:222a-8: mtha' yas dang ni 'jog po dang //
T02D3780:222a-9: stobs kyi rgyu dang rigs ldan dang //
T02D3780:222a-10: nor rgyas dang ni dung skyong dang //
T02D3780:222a-11: padma dang ni chu lha dang //
T02D3780:222a-12: dga' bo dang ni nye dga' bo //
T02D3780:222a-13: rgya mtsho dang ni rgya mtsho che //
T02D3780:222a-15: gzugs chen sprul bzangs stobs po che //
T02D3780:222a-16: klu chen brgyad po 'khor dang bcas //
T02D3780:222a-17: 'dir gshegs mchod sbyin gtor ma bzhes //
T02D3780:222a-18: mdzes pa'i dkar gsum gtor ma 'di //
T02D3780:222a-19: mngar gsum 'o ma'i rgya mtshor bcas //
T02D3780:222a-20: rin chen phreng ba'i them skas can //
T02D3780:222a-21: klu yi gnod pa skyob byed pa //
T02D3780:222a-22: mthun pa'i rdzas su 'di gyur cig / mchod sbyin gtor ma 'di snoms la //
T02D3780:222a-23: bdag cag 'khor dang bcas rnams la //
T02D3780:222a-24: klu las gyur pa'i nad rnams ni //
T02D3780:222a-25: mthong ba'i dug dang kha zas dug / bsams pa'i dug la sogs pa kun //
T02D3780:222a-26: de dag thams cad zhi gyur cig / bdag pas gces pa'i rdzas khyer la //
T02D3780:222a-27: bdag la gnod pa ma byed par //
T02D3780:222a-28: rtag tu byams pa'i sems dang ni //
T02D3780:222a-29: pha ma lta bu'i sems kyis ltos ;
T02D3780:222a-30: / gzhan yang las las skyes pa yi //
T02D3780:222a-31: bka' dang dam las ma thogs pa'i //
T02D3780:222a-32: gdug pa can gyi klu tshogs kun //
T02D3780:222a-34: so so rang rang gnas su dengs //
T02D3780:222a-35: de'i rjes la gtor ma gtang /
T02D3780:222a-38: klu'i gtor chen sgrol ma'i zhabs kyi rdul la reg
T02D3780:222a-39: pa'i mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye
T02D3780:222a-40: shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
